label: w = -1 (or -0.9583 projection tax)
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: w = -1 (or -0.9583 projection tax). Validation: Dark energy doesn't clump
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
w0 = reg.w0_dark_energy          # -0.9583...
tzimtzum = reg.tzimtzum_pressure # 23/24 = 0.9583...
b3 = reg.b3                      # 24

# w0 formula: w0 = -sigma_T = -23/24
# Projection tax: 1/24 deviation from pure cosmological constant
w0_derived = -tzimtzum           # -23/24
projection_tax = 1.0 / b3        # 1/24 = 0.0417

# Verify: w0 = -1 + projection_tax = -23/24
verified = abs(w0_derived - w0) < 1e-10
verified = verified and abs(w0 - (-1 + projection_tax)) < 1e-10
